content: i created this pattern after being challenged by a friend to create a snowflake with skulls on it being a knitter at heart i had only just begun to crochet when i broke my hand and found myself in a cast it may seem like a complicated pattern but take heart i created this and made a whole army of them after crocheting for 1 month when i searched for a skullflake pattern nothing i found truly suited my needs i want to shout out to maryetta roy and her lost souls shawl for the inspiration needed to get there you need to check out her shawl pattern it s awesome no gauge needed you can use thread or something thicker though i believe snowflakes do better with a nice sturdy cotton thread in order to starch up well this snowflake is large about 9 to 10 inches in diameter it would make a great candle doily as well please do not reproduce this pattern for sale thanks
